newsitem.title: UK: TOTAL's UK unit expands operations.
newsitem.headline: TOTAL's UK unit expands operations.

text.p: Total Oil (Great Britain) said Thursday it took over responsibility to run 16 service stations belonging to Margram Plc, one of UK's largest independent service stations.
The sites are mainly located in the North and Midlands, Total said in a statement.
"The new agreement will see the re-branding of the site," the statement said.
Margram, a 30-million stg-plus turnover company, said its staff at the sites would be transferred to the Total group.
